long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate your AtCoder experience with AtCoder Status+! This Chrome extension offers seamless integration with the AtCoder website, providing intuitive visual cues about the status of your submitted tasks. Easily track your progress as tasks are highlighted in green for accepted, red for not accepted, and remain unchanged for not attempted. Additionally, AtCoder Status+ now includes the feature to display the number of users whose solutions are accepted during contest(the ones who are there in standings), empowering you with valuable insights at a glance. Streamline your coding journey with quick and crisp submission status visualization.
